query:
INSERT INTO alerts_active (
                alert_id,
                alert_type,
                machine_id,
                organization_id,
                client_id,
                node_name,
                created_at,
                custom_data
            )
            SELECT
                $1,
                $2,
                m.machine_id,
                c.organization_id,
                m.client_id,
                $3,
                $4,
                $6
            FROM machine m
            JOIN client c
              ON m.client_id = c.client_id
            WHERE m.machine_id = $5   -- lookup based on the provided machine_id
